achievements.name: Emotional
achievements.description: Use every emote in the game

achievements.name: Gathering is not a game! It's war!
achievements.description: Gather resources worth a million Fame

achievements.name: Industrious Crafter
achievements.description: Craft items worth a million Fame

achievements.name: Harmless Person
achievements.description: Reach the first positive reputation level

achievements.name: It's not a phase, mom!
achievements.description: Unlock all Tier 4 weapons and offhands

achievements.name: Critter Killer
achievements.description: Kill 100 Tier 1 mobs of any kind

achievements.name: Alone No Longer
achievements.description: Add a friend to your friend list

achievements.name: First Blood!
achievements.description: Kill or assist a kill in PvP

achievements.name: This. Is. Albion!
achievements.description: Kill 300 players in the open world

achievements.name: Gladiator
achievements.description: Win 100 Arena or Crystal Arena matches

achievements.name: You're Gonna Need a Bigger Boat
achievements.description: Catch fish worth a million Fame

achievements.name: Thief: The Gathering Project
achievements.description: Gather a T8 resource at an enemy territory

achievements.name: My Home is my Shack
achievements.description: Build a house on your island

achievements.name: My Home is my Castle
achievements.description: Upgrade a house on your island to Tier 8

achievements.name: Your very own indentured servant!
achievements.description: Have a Tier 8 Laborer and send them on a mission

achievements.name: Happy Workforce
achievements.description: Send a Laborer on a mission with 100% Yield from Happiness

achievements.name: My sanctuary. Complete.
achievements.description: Upgrade your island to the maximum of 6/6

achievements.name: All Your Base are Belong to Us
achievements.description: Participate in a successful attack on a territory

achievements.name: Give me your clothes, your boots and your mount...
Tonight We Dine in Hell!
achievements.description: Defeat a team of enemy players in any type of Hellgate

achievements.name: Smuggler
achievements.description: Sell any item on the Black Market in Caerleon

achievements.name: Sold!
achievements.description: Sell any item through the Marketplace

achievements.name: Entrepreneur
achievements.description: Sell items worth 100,000 Silver at the Marketplace

achievements.name: Grand Merchant
achievements.description: Sell items worth 1,000,000 Silver at the Marketplace

achievements.name: Tycoon
achievements.description: Sell items worth 10,000,000 Silver at the Marketplace

achievements.name: WE. NEED. YOU.
achievements.description: Enlist in any of the six City Factions

achievements.name: New Sheriff in Town
achievements.description: Defeat all opposing City Faction Warmasters at least once

achievements.name: Partisan
achievements.description: Achieve a standing of 330,000 with any faction

achievements.name: Safe Passage
achievements.description: Finish a Trade Mission for any city

achievements.name: Turn it up to 11!
achievements.description: Overcharge one or more equipped items

achievements.name: One Year of Service
achievements.description: Be part of Albion for one year

achievements.name: Crystal League Chronicles
achievements.description: Participate in a Crystal League Battle

achievements.name: Party Time!
achievements.description: Use the Party Finder to form or join a party

achievements.name: Seen it All
achievements.description: Kill the legendary Morgana Demon General, Keeper Earth Aspirant, Undead Reaper, and Heretic Shadowmask

achievements.name: Big Game Hunter
achievements.description: Harvest resources from Aspects in every biome

achievements.name: Lost My Chest-ity
achievements.description: Unlock your first chest in any kind of Randomized Dungeon.

achievements.name: Look at my horse, my horse is amazing!
In a League of Their Own
achievements.description: Defeat every Avalonian Dungeon boss type

achievements.name: Crystal Adept
achievements.description: Win a Rank 3 5v5 Crystal League Match

achievements.name: Crystal Grandmaster
achievements.description: Win a Rank 7 5v5 Crystal League Match

achievements.name: Pull the Plug
achievements.description: Defeat the Sentry Mage in an enemy territory

achievements.name: Empowered!
achievements.description: Receive the Ascension buff at the end of an Avalonian Dungeon

achievements.name: Invader Banished
achievements.description: Defeat an invading player in a Corrupted Dungeon

achievements.name: Target Destroyed
achievements.description: Defeat another player after invading their Corrupted Dungeon

achievements.name: On and On, South of Avalon
achievements.description: Unlock the Slayer difficulty in Corrupted Dungeons

achievements.name: Corrupted No More
achievements.description: Defeat the final boss in a Hunter Corrupted Dungeon

achievements.name: Far Down the Rabbit Hole
achievements.description: Enter a Deep Road of Avalon

achievements.name: Big Game Hunter in Another World
achievements.description: Harvest resources from a Guardian in the Roads of Avalon

achievements.name: I like it...another!
achievements.description: Chain 2 Hellgates without returning to the surface

achievements.name: Neither Demon nor Man
achievements.description: Chain 5 Hellgates without returning to the surface

achievements.name: Conqueror
achievements.description: Assist in completely capturing another city's zone in Faction Warfare

achievements.name: Dungeon Insider
achievements.description: Participate in a Static Dungeon Event

achievements.name: Keep On Rollin'
achievements.description: Reroll an item at a Repair Station

achievements.name: Finishing Touch
achievements.description: Create a Masterpiece item by rerolling it at a Repair Station

achievements.name: Quality AND Quantity
achievements.description: Reroll a full stack of 999 items at a Repair Station

achievements.name: Best of the Best of the Best
achievements.description: Gain all Elite Levels in any combat specialization

achievements.name: Omae ha mou shindeiru!
achievements.description: Kill 5 enemies at once with the after-effect of the Hundred Striking Fists

achievements.name: Home Sweet Home
achievements.description: Set a Hideout as your Home

achievements.name: Core Workout
achievements.description: Successfully transport a Power Core to a Hideout

achievements.name: Capture the Crystal!
achievements.description: Successfully transport a Power Crystal to a Territory

achievements.name: Holy Diver
achievements.description: Gain 10 million Fame in Static Dungeons

achievements.name: Silver Gladiator
achievements.description: Reach Silver Rank in the Crystal Arena

achievements.name: King of the Hill
achievements.description: Help loot a Castle Outpost Chest

achievements.name: Beyond the Veil
achievements.description: Follow a Will o' Wisp into the Mists

achievements.name: City in the Mists
achievements.description: Find the lost city of Brecilien

achievements.name: Mythologist
achievements.description: Kill any Titan in a Randomized Dungeon

achievements.name: Historian
achievements.description: Kill any Colossus in a Randomized Dungeon

achievements.name: Hunter Exam
achievements.description: Track down a solo Rare Creature

achievements.name: Monster Hunter
achievements.description: Track down 7 different solo Rare Creatures

achievements.name: Fully Fortified
achievements.description: Enter a fully upgraded territory that's owned by your guild

achievements.name: Let Yourself In
achievements.description: Help open the gate of an enemy territory from within
